name: Audio Rush
description:
Information

  • This game creates levels procedurally from any mp3 file.
  • If you play the song for the first time it'll take up to 15 seconds to completly load the data. Depends on the file size.
  • If you enable the "save audio data" option, it'll create a binary file inside the game folder which makes loading much faster if you play the same song again.
  • There are currently 3 difficutly settings. Easy, normal and hard. Normal is double the speed of easy and hard is around 1.3 times faster than normal. 
  • There is one game mode called dodge mode. You have to avoid the dark blocks and hit the colored ones.

Controls:

  • ESC - Pauses and unpauses the game
  • Left arrow / A - Move left
  • Right arrow / D - Move right

I'd be very happy about some feedback! :)

You can contact me here or on Twitter: https://twitter.com/_Buttermilch
